resources.string: Enter ingredient and quantity or ingredient and weight. For example (2 apples) or (300 grams of apples)
We cannot calculate the nutrition for ingredient. Please check the ingredient spelling or if you have entered a quantity for the ingredient.
We cannot calculate the nutrition for some ingredients. Please check the ingredient spelling or if you have entered a quantities for the ingredients.

Enter an ingredient list for what you are cooking. Enter each ingredient on a new line For example:
1) 7 cloves garlic, minced 
2) 1 large peeled apples
3) 1 tablespoon caraway seeds, crushed
Something went wrong! Make sure you spelled the product name and brand correctly and check your internet connection
You got some error. Please check internet connection and try again
